name: Add a single product to the wishlist
fullName: ui-tests/tests/features/wishlist.feature#Add a single product to the wishlist
description:
As a user,
    I want to add products to my wishlist 
    so I can review them later.
descriptionHtml:
As a user,
I want to add products to my wishlist
so I can review them later.

testStage.description:
As a user,
    I want to add products to my wishlist 
    so I can review them later.

steps.name: I am logged in as a valid user
I am on the account page
When I navigate to a Headphones category
And I select a product and click "Add to Wishlist" icon
Then success message should be displayed
And the wishlist count should increase by 1
And the product should appear in the wishlist page
